page.title: 17Children's Games In School 2
page.content: The most popular games children play on their own are card games such as "Patience" and "What";Dominoes, particularly setting them up for a "domino fall", and skipping. The girls like playing a game called "Flooret" where they do handstands. Many of the children play ballgames either on their own or in small groups, and have rhymes to chant as they play. These rhymes also apply to skipping, where two children swing a rope whilst another child jumps over. "Salt mustard vinegar pepper." Many of the girls enjoy playing a form of jumping game which involves two children standing a little way appart with a length of elastic around their legs which another child has to jump over in various ways. Many of the boys enjoy playing pocket sized electronic games.
